amendment.description: To improve the annual reports of the Chief of the National Guard Bureau on the ability of the National Guard to meet its missions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1931 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1931 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S4263-4270; text: CR S4269) To improve the annual reports of the Chief of the National Guard Bureau on the ability of the National Guard to meet its missions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1931 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1931 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Leahy to Amendment SA 1463.
